title: Why can’t we have a wishlist?
body: Why don’t we have the option to put skins, champions, emotes, and other stuff we don’t have into a wish list? That way other people could see it and it would make gifting easier too. Like there could be the option Check Wishlist with the other options when you right click a person on your friends list. Is that a bad idea for some reason?

replies.body: An actually interesting idea! Hope Riot gets to see this. It's been done in other games and platforms and isn't that hard to implement(or so I think it isn't, I might be wrong).
Think they’ll give me some credit??? XD

If you google "skin wishlist" you'll see people have been requesting Riot to implement that for years already. Amazing they haven't done it already considering it would be something that would probably increase their skins sale, but that's Riot for you.
I've had the same idea for years and I still wish they would add it

It could also be a good way of Riot knowing what to put in "your shop"
I'm sick of getting crappy Lux skins and I only need one more Sona skin to complete my collection.

Nah, I don't want to be able to manipulate the exact skin I am going to get in "Your Shop" that way.
The excitement to open these doors to see what you got is part of the fun.

Well, it might not be the exact things you have in your wish list, but if they see you've wishlisted all the Fiora skins, they might just realize that that's a champion they should give you a skin discount for.
I was thinking about including your shop in it but I thought the same thing as satomi, but you have a good idea about it only influencing your shop, not deciding whats in it.
So easy to implement and so nice, come on.

Riot posted why we can't have a wishlist just a few months ago:

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/12/ask-riot-honor-and-wish-lists/
Make a wish list for all LoL players, where they could vote on boards what skin they want most.
Wait are you asking me to do something? I don’t really understand
